mapper.select: SELECT * FROM HOSPITAL_TBL WHERE WGS_84_LON BETWEEN ${minLon} AND ${maxLon} AND WGS_84_LAT BETWEEN ${minLat} AND ${maxLat} AND DUTY_ERYN = 1
SELECT * FROM HOSPITAL_TBL WHERE WGS_84_LON BETWEEN ${minLon} AND ${maxLon} AND WGS_84_LAT BETWEEN ${minLat} AND ${maxLat} AND
SELECT * FROM AED_TBL WHERE WGS84_LON BETWEEN ${minLon} AND ${maxLon} AND WGS84_LAT BETWEEN ${minLat} AND ${maxLat}
SELECT * FROM PHARMACY_TBL WHERE TO_NUMBER(POST_CDN1) BETWEEN ${minLon} AND ${maxLon} AND TO_NUMBER(POST_CDN2) BETWEEN ${minLat} AND ${maxLat}
